mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_INVENTORY, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SOLD, PRODUCT_REGDATE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_ID),0) FROM "PRODUCT" p)+1, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_inventory}, #{product_detail}, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE ,PRODUCT_INVENTORY , PRODUCT_DETAIL , PRODUCT_SOLD , PRODUCT_REGDATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE ,PRODUCT_INVENTORY , PRODUCT_DETAIL , PRODUCT_SOLD , PRODUCT_REGDATE FROM PRODUCT p ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
